content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Had to hack my way around, but is good enough for a challenge for CoC.

How did you put text in?
I cant find how!

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Clearly defined task that could be optimised to a large extent for shortest gamemode. Could do with also searching for word pairs but that may make the task too difficult.

Title/Output section/Stub generator/Case names
* Please fix the typos: "occurences" => "occurrences".

Goal section
* Suggest to change "strictly" to "strictly on its own, not as part of another word".

* Please specify that punctuations are ignored when counting words.

* Please change "a occurence" to "one occurrence".

* As I can't see any case featuring the "numeric" part, and at the same time to correct the variable name and text formatting, suggest to change the last sentence as:
[[word]] contains letters in the English alphabet and may contain {{_}}.

Input section
* Please add "Next" before "n lines".

Cases
* Please change Validator 1 so that the output is not 0 0 (e.g. change the word to find to "poor").

* I see that "Hello" is the word to search in Test 2 (simple case), Test 4 (special chars) and Validator 4. Only in these cases, the word to search contains an uppercase letter, and the sentences contain the given word in exactly the same case. The case-insensitivity aspect is not well-tested. Suggest to revise the cases.

(I notice that you've done the opposite only, i.e. all letters in the given word are in the lowercase, but it appears in a different case in the sentences.)

Thanks.
Thanks for your feedbacks. I made the changes.
